description.en: Design a stack with push, pop, top, and getMin in O(1).
description.zh-CN: [题目155] Design a stack with push, pop, top, and getMin in ...
description.zh-TW: [題目155] Design a stack with push, pop, top, and getMin in ...
description.ja: [問題155] Design a stack with push, pop, top, and getMin in ...
description.es: [Problema 155] Design a stack with push, pop, top, and getMin in ...
description.de: [Problem 155] Design a stack with push, pop, top, and getMin in ...
description.fr: [Problème 155] Design a stack with push, pop, top, and getMin in ...

explanation.en: APL solution for Min Stack. Uses reduction (/) to aggregate values: +/ sums, ×/ multiplies, ⌈/ finds max, ⌊/ finds min. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.zh-CN: Min Stack 的 APL 解决方案。使用归约 (/) 聚合值：+/ 求和，×/ 相乘，⌈/ 找最大值，⌊/ 找最小值。实现使用 APL 的面向数组原语进行简洁表达。
explanation.zh-TW: Min Stack 的 APL 解決方案。使用歸約 (/) 聚合值：+/ 求和，×/ 相乘，⌈/ 找最大值，⌊/ 找最小值。實現使用 APL 的面向陣列原語進行簡潔表達。
